snippet.title: Doki Doki Blue Skies - Text Message
snippet.description: MC's Phone is a big part of the mod. Rather than just having plain text to show phone calls and text messages, we've implemented a system that uses NVL Mode to simulate a text message conversation. Just don't go trying to hook it up to a microwave.
